text: The 1945 Kentucky Wildcats football team represented the University of Kentucky in the 1945 college football season.https://www.sports- reference.com/cfb/schools/kentucky/1944-schedule.html The team was led by first-year head coach Bernie Shively. ==Schedule== ==References== Kentucky Category:Kentucky Wildcats football seasons Kentucky Wildcats football
title: 1945 Kentucky Wildcats football team
